faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What is insurance advisory in the UAE?
items.answer: Corporate insurance advisory consultancy involves a skilled insurance agent who provides personalised advice to a business or individual about the various insurance options to safeguard their business.

items.question: How quickly can One Nexuz help set up insurance coverage?
items.answer: Our expert insurance providers can arrange tailored insurance policy packages in as little as 48 hours once you submit all the necessary documents.

items.question: Can One Nexuz help me resolve insurance claims?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our skilled insurance agents offer personalised guidance through the claim process to ensure quick, accurate, and cost-efficient settlements.

items.question: What documents do I need to set up an insurance policy?
items.answer: Generally, you’ll need a trade license, an Emirates ID, and basic financial documents to secure your insurance policy.

items.question: Does One Nexuz offer tailored insurance advice for different industries?
items.answer: Yes, our certified business insurance agents boast in-depth knowledge of diverse industries, from e-commerce to automotive, empowering you with industry-specific recommendations.
